title: Carandiru [2003 PAL DVD][Pt.Es Multisubs[17]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0293007/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0293007/</a> 7,5


	

This the story of a doctor working at the state prison Carandiru in order to implement an AIDS prevention programme. Volunteering his work weekly, this film tells the stories of the inmates he meets, before the infamous Pavillion 9 massacre of 1992 when 111 unarmed inmates were killed.



Director Hector Babenco
Certificate 15 years and over
Year 2003
Screen Widescreen 1.85:1 Anamorphic
Languages Portuguese Spanish English - Dolby Digital (5.1)
Subtitles Arabic Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish Greek Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Icelandic Norwegian Polish Portugese Spanish Swedish Turkish
Duration 2 hours and 20 minutes (approx)
Region Region 2 


Audio commentary from director Hector Babenco 
Deleted scenes 
'The Making Of Carandiru' featurette 
Historical footage 
Interactive menu 
Scene access

Luis Carlos Vasconcelos, Milhem Cortaz, Milton Goncalves, Ivan De Almeida & Ailton Graca
